page.title: 10HEALTH CARE ON ALSTON MOOR
page.content: Alston maintains its{Cottage Hospital which provides twelve beds including one midwifery bed.The building is the centre for health provision and houses the surgery which is shared by two G.P.'s,a dentist's surgery and facilities for phyiotherapy,chiropody, speech therapy and X-rays.Child health and family planning clinics are held at the hospital.The district nurse carries out home visits. Organisations for young children include tho post-natal support group,the toddler group and the play group.
